OptionChoice.name: enableReactorCraft
OptionChoice.Description: Should Custom Ore Generation handle ReactorCraft ore generation?

Choice.description: Use Custom Ore Generation to handle ReactorCraft ores.
ReactorCraft ores will be handled by the mod itself.

OptionChoice.name: cleanUpReactorCraft
OptionChoice.Description: Should Custom Ore Generation use the Substitution Pass to remove all instances of ReactorCraft ore from the world? If the mod's oregen can be turned off in its configuration, then it's recommended to do so, as the substitution pass can slow the game significantly. If this option is disabled without disabling the mod's own ore generation, you'll end up with two oregens working at once, flooding the world with ore. Enabled by default to ensure the ores are completely removed.

Choice.description: Use the substitution pass to clean up ReactorCraft ores.
ReactorCraft ores do not need to be cleaned up by a substitution pass.

OptionChoice.name: recrPitchblendeDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Pitchblende is generated

Choice.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.
Simulates Vanilla Minecraft.

Choice.description: Pitchblende is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: recrPitchblendeFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for ReactorCraft Pitchblende distributions

OptionNumeric.name: recrPitchblendeSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for ReactorCraft Pitchblende distributions

OptionChoice.name: recrCadmiumDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Cadmium is generated

Choice.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.
Simulates Vanilla Minecraft.

Choice.description: Cadmium is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: recrCadmiumFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for ReactorCraft Cadmium distributions

OptionNumeric.name: recrCadmiumSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for ReactorCraft Cadmium distributions

Substitute.name: recrOverworldBlockSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).
